hero.description: We design and manufacture quality motorized equipment to mechanize your agricultural production and increase your yield.
hero.form_subtitle: Describe your project and we will contact you quickly.
hero.form_success: Request sent! We will contact you soon.

about.title: About AgroPTM
about.subtitle: Engineering for your yield
about.description: AgroPTM is a Cameroonian company specialized in the design and manufacturing of robust motorized agricultural machines. Our mission is to mechanize agro-food processing to reduce labor intensity and significantly increase farmer productivity.
about.team_text: A passionate team of engineers and technicians dedicated to agricultural innovation.
about.realization1: Grinder-mixer in action - Efficient raw material processing
about.realization2: Satisfied customer with our quality industrial equipment
about.realization3: Series production - Machines ready for delivery

realizations.title: Our Latest Projects
realizations.text: Discover our machines in the field. Proven robustness and efficiency.

product.whatsapp_message: Hello AgroPTM, I am interested in your machine: {{productName}} seen on your website.

gx200.name: Mo GX200 Flour Mill
gx200.desc: 5.5 HP Engine, special for maize and cassava. Ideal for artisanal and semi-industrial production.

broyeur.name: Grinder-Mixer
broyeur.desc: Models for livestock and poultry feed. Ensures homogeneous mixing for optimal nutrition.

raffles.name: Corn Cob Mill
raffles.desc: Agricultural residue valorization. Transform waste into usable resources.

presse.name: Stripper & Oil Press
presse.desc: Complete solutions for the palm oil industry. Efficient and robust extraction.
